descriptionHtml:
[center][color=lime]-= MOD HAS BEEN UPDATED TO v1.1[/color][/center]

[center][color=green]-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-[/center]
Changelog v1.1:
- Nights were completely remade. Now they are a bit darker, but still visible.
- No more night bloom. (no sun -> no bloom).
- No more purple glowing snow at nights.
- No more vignette.
- Days now a little bit brighter.
- Fixed HDR adaptive time.
- Fixed Camera Lens FX.

FXAA Injector 2.1 included.
FXAA Natural Preset included (screenshot added).
Skyboost r3 included.

Knowing issues:
- Glowing foam and some types of smoke at nights.
- Transparent water at nights.
- Some cave lights looking very bright.

FPS LOSS:
Spec: i5-2500, 4 GB, GTX 560Ti. AA 2x, AF 16x, Ultra Settings, FXAA On. Skyboost On.
MOD OFF: 46-52 fps.
MOD ON: 29-34 fps.
[center]-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-[/center][/color]

Hi, guys! This is my ENB+FXAA preset. I really like how it looks, and i decided to share it with you.

[color=yellow]Description:[/color]
In my work i modified ENB HD6 Lightning Enhancement Preset. I also created my own palette to make colors in Skyrim more realistic and bright. Dark nights are not pleasant to me, so my nights aren\'t so dark and looking very realistic (see screenshots). I also created FXAA Injector profile to tweak colors and exposure a little.

[color=yellow]Install:[/color]
There are 2 folders in the archive. Just copy files all files from \"Colorful HDR v.1.1\" folder into your Skyrim root folder.

I also included \"Optional\" folder in archive. There you can find FXAA Natural preset for this mod. It will make colors more naturally and desaturated. Just copy contents of the folder into your Skyrim root folder.

Also I included \"Skyboost r3\". This is Performance patch for your Skyrim. It based on TESV Acceleration Layer, but it is better. It gives you additional 6-10 fps over TESVAL. Just copy files into your Skyrim root folder. No SKSE needed.
[u]WARNING! You must delete TESVAL (Skyrim\\Data\\SKSE\\Plugins\\TESVAL.dll) before using Skyboost.[/u]

[color=magenta]Notes:[/color]
- FXAA Injector 2.1 is already included with mod.
- bFloatPointRenderTarget=1 must be set in SkyrimPrefs.ini file to make this mod work. 
- SSAO is enabled by default (fast mode). If you experience perfomance lags, you can easily switch it off in enbseries.ini: EnableAmbientOcclusion=true -> EnableAmbientOcclusion=false.

[color=yellow]Thanks to:[/color]
- Boris Vorontsov for the Original ENB series.
- HeliosDoubleSix for his ENB HD6 Lighting Enhancement.
- some_dude for FXAA Injector.
- Bethesda for such a great game.

Sorry for my bad english, guys (i\'m russian). I will really appreciate you for your regards, suggestions and criticism in comments.

[color=cyan]Enjoy![/color]
author: Ortiz
